mapper.select: select count(*) total_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000001,1,0)) wait_4_received_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000003,1,0)) wait_4_reviewed_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000005,1,0)) wait_4_retransmitted_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000002,1,0)) inspecting_count from system.task t where t.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select count(*) total_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000006,1,0)) finish_count from system.task t where t.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000001,1,0)) wait_4_received_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000003,1,0)) wait_4_reviewed_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000005,1,0)) wait_4_retransmitted_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000002,1,0)) inspecting_count from system.task t

select u.real_name AS inspectorName, t.code,t.begin_time AS beginTime,t.end_time AS endTime,t.task_status AS taskStatus, u.id,t.id,GROUP_CONCAT(c.component_name) AS inspectingContent from system.user u left outer join system.task t on u.id = t.inspector left outer join system.task_component tc on t.id = tc.task_id left outer join system.component c on tc.component_id = c.id where u.duty = 2 group by u.id,t.id
